citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
The program of veterinary care states that regularly scheduled visits by the attending veterinarian must be accomplished
once annually. The last veterinary visit was January 11, 2022 and per the attending veterinarian there has been no
contact from the facility, and an appointment for a regularly scheduled visit has not been made.
Each dealer and exhibitor shall assure that the attending veterinarian has appropriate authority to ensure the provision of
adequate veterinary care and to oversee the adequacy of other aspects of animal care and use.
The licensee must follow the written program of veterinary care and contact and make an appointment for the regularly
scheduled visit with the attending veterinarian at the frequency the attending veterinarian prescribes to ensure appropriate
authority by the attending veterinarian.
To be corrected by May 19, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
